articles.title: Giancarlo Stanton, Byron Buxton homer as American League wins 9th straight All-Star Game
articles.description: Giancarlo Stanton and Byron Buxton hit back-to-back home runs, and the American League beat the National League 3-2 in Tuesday's All-Star Game.

articles.title: American Fred Kerley cramps up in 200-meter semifinal, takes sixth at track world championships
articles.description: World 100-meter champion Fred Kerley will not have a chance at two individual medals at the world championships after he slowed down midway through his 200-meter semifinal due to a cramp and finished sixth on Tuesday night.
articles.content: EUGENE, Ore. -- World 100-meter champ Fred Kerley will not have a chance at two individual medals at the world championships after he slowed down midway through his 200-meter semifinal due to a cramp… [+1275 chars]

articles.title: Felony charges filed against Charlotte Hornets' Miles Bridges for domestic violence, child abuse
articles.description: Hornets restricted free agent Miles Bridges has been formally charged with felony domestic violence and child abuse stemming from an alleged assault that occurred last month in Los Angeles, the L.A. County District Attorney's Office announced Tuesday.

articles.title: Baltimore Orioles take 7-foot left-hander Jared Beck on Day 3 of MLB draft; would be MLB's tallest player ever
articles.description: The Baltimore Orioles selected 7-foot left-hander Jared Beck from Saint Leo University with the first pick in Round 13 of baseball's amateur draft.
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES -- The Baltimore Orioles aimed high with their 13th-round draft pick.
A full seven feet -- and that's before their new pitching prospect gets on the mound.

articles.title: Clark Lea determined to make Vanderbilt Commodores football 'the best program in the country'
articles.description: Vanderbilt may have finished 2-10 last season, but coach Clark Lea is determined to make the Commodores "the best program in the country," he confidently told reporters on Tuesday at SEC Media Days in Atlanta.
articles.content:
ATLANTA -- Vanderbilt coach Clark Lea is undeterred by last season's 2-10 record or the program's eight consecutive seasons finishing below .500.

articles.title: Rob Manfred adamant MLB has 'made real strides in the last few years' in paying minor leaguers

articles.description: Andrew Wiggins said he still wishes he didn't get vaccinated against COVID-19, despite a season in which he was named to his first All-Star team and helped the Warriors with the NBA championship.

articles.description: NASCAR's Cup Series will have an unprecedented street race next July 2 on a course that includes Lake Shore Drive, Michigan Avenue and South Columbia Drive, where the start/finish line and pit road will be located directly in front of Buckingham Fountain.
